file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition. Valid.
  version: 1.0.0
  description: test
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT

servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1

paths:
  '/ping/{id}/{userId}':
    parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        required: true
        description: The user ID.
    get:
      operationId: getPing
      summary: Example summary
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: userId
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: Numeric ID of the user to get
      responses:
        '200':
          description: example description
